name: RRRRRR - Create & Share (Made with Cocos Creator)
name_original: RRRRRR - Create & Share (Made with Cocos Creator)
description:
I am working on the Level Editor for my game RRRRRR https://maxmariodev.itch.io/rrrrrr an HTML5 game that loads fast and runs smoothly in mobile web browsers.

The editor is for players to use, not the game developers or level designers.

The players who want to make their own levels or puzzles for the game RRRRRR, can easily use this editor to either modify an existing level or create a new one.

Then they can share the levels to friends or even the creators like Youtubers to play their challenging levels.

Imagine when players are using Facebook, messenger or Oooh to playing social games with their friends. Then their friends send over the RRRRRR game link with the levels created by their friends who are trying to challenge them with a hardcore level.

------------------------------------------------------------

The editor is aiming to be easy-to-use on touch screen devices, no need to use mouse or keyboard to create a level.

Instead of using mouse and keyboard to edit a level on PC like most professional game level designers, our players can create levels with their mobile phones.

------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------

Game is made with Cocos Creator, an cross-platform game engine.

Social features: 

  • Friend list to send in-game gifts to friends or ask friends for hearts (when dies too many times and have no more in-game hearts to play the game)
  • Inbox system to receive daily rewards and friends' gift or heart requests.
  • Leaderboard to show the top players globally or among friends. Let gamer friends to compete with each other.
  • Get referral rewards (skin or in-game currency) when invite friends and friends join the game.

------------------------------------------------------------

Skins:

Players can choose different skins to play with their friends and show off their new pixel skins, or even create their own skins.
